vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.17;
son of: Ezrah (H5834);
brother of: Jether (H3500J), Mered (H4778) and Epher (H6081H)
§ Jalon = "Jehovah lodges"
a son of Ezra and a descendant of Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Esdras; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅倫 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華居住"
以斯拉的兒子 (代上 4:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅伦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华居住"
以斯拉的儿子 (代上 4:17)
